IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: The African American Museum is dedicated to the collection. preservation, exhibition and research of artistic expression and historical documents that relate to the life and culture of the African American community.
IRS990.MissionDesc: The African American Museum is dedicated to the collection, preservation, exhibition and research of artistic expressions and historical documents that relate to the life and culture of the African American community.
IRS990.Desc: Museum activities to preserve and display African American artistic, cultural and historical materials including educational and cultural programs for adults and after school programs for youth.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: President receives health insurance reimbursments, monthly housing voucher and monthly expense check.
Policies were approved by Board of Directors

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The completed and approved 990 form is then forwarded to the full board for overall and final review before filing.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Each board member and key employee is given a copy of the policy as a part of their startup package. On an annual basis major business relationships are reviewed for any possible conflict of interest transactions.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Our 990 report is made available to the general public through Guidestar website. Our financial statement information is included in out 990 report. Our articles of incorporation and bylaws are made available upon request. Our audited financial statements would be made available to the general public upon request.
Other services include contract labor and misc expenses for programming, operational and adminstrative services
